item.title: Steamboat Willie Horror Movie Casts Teen Wolf & Terrifier 2 Stars
item.description: The upcoming horror movie Screamboat, which puts a sinister take on Mickey Mouse's Steamboat Willie character, has recently cast two more stars.

item.title: 5 Realistic Possibilities For What Star Wars' New Movie Trilogy Could Be About, From Episodes 10-12 To The Old Republic
item.description: Simon Kinberg is working on a new Star Wars trilogy... and here are the best options for what these new movies could actually be about!

item.title: Richard Gere Reflects On His Past Via Euphoria's Jacob Elordi In Oh, Canada Trailer
item.description: The Oh, Canada trailer reveals Richard Gere reflecting on his past via Euphoria's Jacob Elordi in the new film written and directed by Paul Schrader.
